mapper.select: /* Gift.selectGiftListCount */ SELECT COUNT(GFT_MST_IDX) FROM T_GFT_MST TGM WHERE 1=1

/* Gift.selectGiftList */ SELECT S2.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM , S1.* FROM ( SELECT TGM.GFT_MST_IDX /* 사은품관리_IDX */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_BRAND_CD /* 브랜드코드 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_NAME /* 사은품명 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_OPTION /* 사은품_옵션 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_ST_DT /* 시작일자 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_ED_DT /* 종료일자 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_COND_AMT /* 조건금액 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_USE_YN /* 사용여부 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_REG_DT /* 최초_등록일 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_REG_IP /* 최초_등록_IP */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_REG_ID /* 최초_등록자_아이디 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_UPD_DT /* 최종_수정일 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_UPD_IP /* 최종_수정_IP */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_UPD_ID /* 최종_수정자_아이디 */ ,NVL( (SELECT COUNT(TPG.PRD_GFT_IDX) FROM T_PRD_GFT TPG WHERE TGM.GFT_MST_IDX = TPG.GFT_MST_IDX ) , 0) AS PRD_CNT /* 상품 수 */ FROM T_GFT_MST TGM WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY TGM.GFT_MST_IDX DESC ) S1 ) S2 WHERE S2.RNUM BETWEEN #{startNum} AND #{endNum} ORDER BY RNUM

/* Gift.selectGiftInfo */ SELECT TGM.GFT_MST_IDX /* 사은품관리_IDX */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_BRAND_CD /* 브랜드코드 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_NAME /* 사은품명 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_OPTION /* 사은품_옵션 */ ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TGM.GFT_MST_ST_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GFT_MST_ST_DT /* 시작일자 */ ,TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(TGM.GFT_MST_ED_DT,'YYYYMMDD'),'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GFT_MST_ED_DT /* 종료일자 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_COND_AMT /* 조건금액 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_USE_YN /* 사용여부 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_REG_DT /* 최초_등록일 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_REG_IP /* 최초_등록_IP */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_REG_ID /* 최초_등록자_아이디 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_UPD_DT /* 최종_수정일 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_UPD_IP /* 최종_수정_IP */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_UPD_ID /* 최종_수정자_아이디 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_GUBUN /* 사은품 구분 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_STOCK_CNT /* 사은품 재고 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_PRD_TYPE /* 사은품이미지 타입 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_PRD_CD /* 사은품이미지 상품코드 */ ,TGM.GFT_MST_PLN_IDX /* 사은품 기획전 IDX */ ,(SELECT ADM_MST_NM FROM T_ADM_MST TAM WHERE TAM.ADM_MST_ID = TGM.GFT_MST_REG_ID) AS GFT_MST_REG_NM ,(SELECT ADM_MST_NM FROM T_ADM_MST TAM WHERE TAM.ADM_MST_ID = TGM.GFT_MST_UPD_ID) AS GFT_MST_UPD_NM , FL.CMM_FLE_ATT_PATH , FL.CMM_FLE_SYS_NM , FL.CMM_FLE_IDX , FL.CMM_FLE_SYS_PATH , FL.CMM_FLE_ORG_NM , FL.CMN_FLE_ALT_TXT FROM T_GFT_MST TGM LEFT OUTER JOIN T_CMM_FLE FL ON TGM.GFT_MST_IDX= FL.CMM_FLE_TB_PK AND FL.CMM_FLE_USE_YN = 'Y' AND FL.CMM_FLE_TB_NM = 'T_GFT_MST' WHERE GFT_MST_IDX = #{GFT_MST_IDX}

/* Gift.selectProductList */ SELECT TPM.PRD_MST_CD, TPM.PRD_MST_NM, TPM.PRD_MST_CNL_PC_YN, TPM.PRD_MST_CNL_MB_YN , TPM.PRD_MST_SEL_STATE, TPM.PRD_MST_PRC, TPM.PRD_MST_SCH_PRC FROM T_PRD_GFT TPG, T_PRD_MST TPM WHERE TPG.PRD_PRD_MST_CD = TPM.PRD_MST_CD AND TPG.GFT_MST_IDX = #{GFT_MST_IDX}
mapper.update: /* Gift.updateGift */ UPDATE T_GFT_MST SET GFT_MST_BRAND_CD = #{GFT_MST_BRAND_CD}, GFT_MST_NAME = #{GFT_MST_NAME}, GFT_MST_OPTION = #{GFT_MST_OPTION}, GFT_MST_ST_DT = REPLACE(#{GFT_MST_ST_DT},'-', ''), GFT_MST_ED_DT = REPLACE(#{GFT_MST_ED_DT},'-', ''), GFT_MST_COND_AMT = #{GFT_MST_COND_AMT}, GFT_MST_USE_YN = #{GFT_MST_USE_YN}, GFT_MST_UPD_DT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'), GFT_MST_UPD_IP = #{GFT_MST_UPD_IP}, GFT_MST_UPD_ID = #{GFT_MST_UPD_ID}, GFT_MST_GUBUN = #{GFT_MST_GUBUN}, GFT_MST_STOCK_CNT = #{GFT_MST_STOCK_CNT}, GFT_MST_PRD_TYPE = #{GFT_MST_PRD_TYPE}, GFT_MST_PRD_CD = #{GFT_MST_PRD_CD}, GFT_MST_PLN_IDX = #{GFT_MST_PLN_IDX} WHERE GFT_MST_IDX = #{GFT_MST_IDX}
mapper.delete: /* Gift.deleteProduct */ DELETE FROM T_PRD_GFT WHERE GFT_MST_IDX = #{GFT_MST_IDX}
mapper.select: /*Gift.selectPlanList*/ SELECT PLN.PLN_MST_IDX, PLN.PLN_MST_CHANNEL_PC_YN, PLN.PLN_MST_CHANNEL_MOBILE_YN, PLN.PLN_MST_TITLE FROM T_PLN_MST PLN WHERE PLN.PLN_MST_USE_YN = 'Y' AND (PLN.PLN_MST_ST_DT > TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND PLN.PLN_MST_ED_DT < TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS'))
